description:
The Holy Yoga 101 course is a great way to learn the basics of yoga asanas or postures, breath work, and meditation. The course is set up with four main workshops taught through verbal and visual ques. Starting with the Holy Yoga Workshop #1 take the time that you need to feel confident in your understanding of the postures. Beginners may take a week or more on one workshop video, whereas experienced practitioners may take less time. Go at your own rate of learning. When you are ready progress to the next workshop video.

Take this course if you are interested in learning the basics of yoga, or reviewing your foundation of yoga.
title: Holy Yoga 101
